definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: So there is the short-term issue of how to tighten policy safely.
sentences.chinese: 所以短期問題是如何安全縮緊政策。

sentences.english: Urethrol tightening was used in 4 cases of complete female epispadias.
sentences.chinese: 女性完全型尿道上裂採用尿道縮緊術4例。

sentences.english: The pig squealed, curled up its tail tightly and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 那頭豬哇哇地叫着，縮緊它的尾巴逃走了。

sentences.english: Through last winter, China’s central bank repeatedly raised the amount of capital it required Chinese commercial banks to deposit with it.
sentences.chinese: 去年整個冬天，中國央行不斷向商業銀行縮緊銀根。
